source_sentence: 我今迴向諸善根　　為得普賢殊勝行　願我臨欲命終時　　盡除一切諸障礙　面見彼佛阿彌陀　　即得往生安樂剎　我既往生彼國已　　現前成就此大願　一切圓滿盡無餘　　利樂一切眾生界　彼佛眾會咸清淨　　我時於勝蓮華生　親覩如來無量光　　現前授我菩提記　蒙彼如來授記已　　化身無數百俱胝　智力廣大遍十方　　普利一切眾生界　我此普賢殊勝行　　無邊勝福皆迴向　普願沉溺諸眾生　　速往無量光佛剎今日大眾。
translation: "Now, I've reverted to the good roots in order to attain the extraordinary practice of Samantabhadra, hoping that when I'm about to die, all obstacles will be removed, and I'll meet the Buddha Amitâbha and be reborn in the Serenity Bhava. I've accomplished this great vow once I was born in that country, and I've now fulfilled all the perfections, ended them completely, and made them beneficial to all sentient beings. The congregation of those buddhas is completely purified. I then grew up on the distinguished lotus flower, saw the Tathāgata's limitless radiance, and was granted the mark of enlightenment by the Tathāgata. After he granted me the mark, my transformation body was incalculably hundreds of corpuscles, my wisdom powers were vast throughout the ten directions, and I benefited all sentient beings in the world.
Today's assembly has made this dedication of merit as explained by Samantabhadra above.

Aah! How could it be easy to measure?

source_sentence: 通政大夫禮曹參議臣　李克墩　謹跋
translation: Li Kedun, Minister of Rituals and Administrators, esteemed commentator
